channel.title: Sound Effects Help,

item.title: Sound Effects Help,
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

Hello all, I’ve recently added sounds to some of my weapons. But I’m not sure how to add it to magic. Heres the code. could anyone help?

[code]/**
* Weapon Sounds
*/
public int getWepSound(String weaponName) {
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] <= 0) {
switch(c.fightMode) {
case 0:
return 416;
case 2:
return 417;
case 1:
return 418;
}
}
if(weaponName.contains(“scimitar”) || weaponName.contains(“longsword”))
return 396;
switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {
case 4151:
return 1080;
}
if(weaponName.contains(“scimitar”) || weaponName.contains(“longsword”))
return 396;
switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {
case 861:
return 370;
}
if(weaponName.contains(“scimitar”) || weaponName.contains(“longsword”))
return 396;
switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {
case 868:
case 876:
return 369;
}
if(weaponName.contains(“scimitar”) || weaponName.contains(“longsword”))
return 396;
switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {
case 4212:
case 4213:
case 4214:
return 391;

	}
	return 0;
}
/**
 * Magic sounds
*/
public int getMagicSound(int spellId) {
	return c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spellId][16];[/code]

Read full topic
